textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer A self-proclaimed exemplar of the American Dream, born and bred Californian Rachel Roy came to New York after graduating college determined to succeed in fashion. After stints as a stylist for magazines and music videos, Roy went on to a position at Rocawear before launching her own clothing line in 2005. Roy finds inspiration for her collection in the lives of busy, modern women like herself who wish to look sophisticated and effortlessly elegant in both their professional and personal lives.
